word.description: {菊花} is *chrysanthemum flower* ({菊} is *chrysanthemum* and {花} is *flower*), and {茶} is [tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tea), so {菊花茶} is *chrysanthemum flower tea*.

images.place: Dim Sum Cafe, Las Vegas, Nevada

description: A light sweet herbal tea brewed with chyrsanthemum flower blossoms, [chrysanthmum tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chrysanthemum_tea) is the standard non-caffeinated tea option in dim sum restaurants, and is considered to have [health benefits](https://www.webmd.com/diet/health-benefits-chrysanthemum-tea).

word.description:
{菊} is *chrysanthemum*, and {普} is the first character for *Pu'er* ({普洱}), so {菊普} is *chrysanthemum Pu'er*.

Or think of it as a mashup of chrysanthemum tea ({菊花茶}) and Pu'er tea ({普洱茶}), and combine the first characters from the two names.

description: [Pu'er tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pu%27er_tea) blended with chrysanthemum to add a lighter flavor and fragrance.
